item.title: “Was A Lot Of Fun Watching It On Mute”: Peter Jackson’s $84M Fantasy Flop Leaves VFX Artists Both Floored & Enraged 6 Years Later
item.description: Peter Jackson's 2018 fantasy film receives a rating from Corridor Crew years after it flopped at the box office and failed to start a franchise.

item.title: Disastrous Masters Of The Universe Movie With 21% On Rotten Tomatoes Got One Thing Right About He-Man
item.description: Dolph Lundgren's Masters of the Universe movie was a bit of a disaster, but it does have bright moments and should be celebrated for its absurdity.

item.title: 10 Former Child Stars Who Will Always Be Associated With Their Breakout Role (& Where They Are Now)
item.description: Actors who have success at an early age as child stars risk always being associated with that one first role, even decades into their career.
